text: Join me & my partners, @KateCra42649509, @danmichaluk @EdonaVila & @ewa_krajewska @BLGLaw on 2/2/2021 for a roundtable on #COVID19 #vaccine & workplaces. 30 mins of #lawyerly thoughts to get your #employer #business planning started on #mandatory #vaccinations.
